Word_Entry.notes: She makes delicious adobo. Very tasty!
Word_Entry.hint: Nanay - Pepay's Mother. She's the one that cooks for the family

Word_Entry.notes: He was the one that made our treehouse in the backyard.
Word_Entry.hint: This is my father. He is the one that works for the family

Word_Entry.notes: He also teases me a lot.
Word_Entry.hint: My older brother. He likes to play basketball and all different kinds of sports.

Word_Entry.notes: She told me she really likes this boy once. i forgot his name.
Word_Entry.hint: She is my older sister. She likes to spend her time with her phone.

Word_Entry.notes: We play board games a lot
Word_Entry.hint: My father's father. He uses glasses to read the newspaper

Word_Entry.notes: She also likes to tell us stories from her time.
Word_Entry.hint: My father's mother. She walks around with a cane
My younger sibling. He likes to play toys
He is my parent's brother. I don't know which one though

Word_Entry.notes: She likes to hang out with my mother.
Word_Entry.hint: My mother's sister. She is a great cook too
